Feature.Name: Skulker
Feature.Text: You are expert at slinking through shadows. You gain the following benefits: • You can try to hide when you are lightly obscured from the creature from which you are hiding. • When you are hidden from a creature and miss it with a ranged weapon attack, making the attack doesn't reveal your position. • Dim light doesn’t impose disadvantage on your Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight.
